works.description:
DESCRIPTION AND URL(S) OF INFRINGING MATERIAL
=============================================

I am contacting you on behalf of Tokuma Japan Communications Co., Ltd.
("Tokuma Japan", "us", "we" or "our company"). Tokuma Japan swears
under penalty of perjury that Tokuma Japan is the copyright or
intellectual property owner described in the below report.

Tokuma Japan has reasonable good faith belief that use of the material
in the manner complained of in the below report is not authorized by
Tokuma Japan, its agents, or the law. Tokuma Japan certifies under
penalty of perjury that the information provided herein is accurate to
the best of our knowledge.

All titles and rights, including copyrights, to any and all music,
videos, performances, booklets, covers, labels, photobooks,
photographic and/or visual images, documents produced by Tokuma Japan
are reserved and/or exclusively controlled by Tokuma Japan.

No part of such music, videos, performances, booklets, covers, labels,
photobooks, photographic and/or visual images, documents may be
reproduced, remixed, mashuped, subtitled, transmitted, uploaded,
broadcasted, exhibited, exploited or otherwise used in any form or by
any means, electronic or mechanical, digital or analog, including
photocopy, recording, wire or cable-system, transmission, or any
information storage and retrieval system, without the prior written
permission of Tokuma Japan, except in accordance with the provisions
of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C. Section 512
("DMCA"), the Copyright Law of Japan, and any other relevant laws.

We have learned that your service is hosting the below web content(s)
on your network. These content(s) are offering direct link(s) to
file(s) containing the above-described material(s) for other users to
download by such artists as Perfume. These material(s) are owned
and/or exclusively controlled by Tokuma Japan and have not been
authorized for this kind of use.

Unauthorized copies of products that are freely available cause
substantial damage to us every hour and day they remain available.
We hereby request that you immediately remove or block access to the
infringing material(s), as specified in the copyright laws, and insure
the user refrains from using or sharing with others unauthorized our
material(s) in the future.


Copyrighted Work(s) or Right(s)
-------------------------------
